    committer: metze
    timestamp: Tue 2007-05-08 09:54:01 +0000
    message:
      - add missing _talloc_set_name_const(ret, ret); to talloc_append_string()

        in all places which use them
      
      metze
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.132

    message:
      test if calling talloc_free() works on parent elements from within a destrutor
      
      metze
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.131
    merged: svn-v2:22756@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22753@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Tue 2007-05-08 04:38:16 +0000
    message:
      Make it easier to setup an LDAP replica.  Provision with
      --partitions-only (suggestions for a better name welcome) will setup
      the partitions records, but no any data in those partitions.  This can
      then point at the already configured remote LDAP server.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.130
    merged: svn-v2:22753@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
